name: arabic-pdf-translator
description: Arabic PDF OCR and translation pipeline. Multi-engine OCR (Tesseract + EasyOCR + PaddleOCR) with 7-stage Arabic-tuned preprocessing, 4-method ensemble translation (Claude, Google Cloud, DeepL, OpenAI), and quality evaluation with heuristic scoring and Claude-as-judge arbitration. Translates scanned Arabic PDFs to English with automatic best-result selection.
